list.title: 2DGUI
list.description: Handles all 2D graphical user interface elements, including sliders, buttons, knobs, and parameter displays. This namespace integrates WebAudioControls for creating custom, reusable components to control audio parameters seamlessly. Its focus is on interactive and visually appealing controls optimized for 2D environments.

list.title: 2DGUI.WebAudioControlsWidget
list.description: Custom HTML element that serves as a container for WebAudio control widgets such as knobs, sliders, switches, keyboards, and parameters. Handles user interactions, rendering, and event dispatching for audio controls.

list.title: 2DGUI.WebAudioKnob
list.description:
Custom element representing a rotary knob control for WebAudio applications. The knob supports configurable appearance, interaction, and value mapping. It integrates with the ParameterManager for dynamic parameter updates and supports both linear and logarithmic scaling.

Features:

  • Fully customizable via attributes (e.g., min, max, step, colors).
  • High-DPI support with dynamic resizing and responsive behavior.
  • Integrates with external systems via bidirectional updates.
  • Emits standard DOM events (input, change) for value changes.

list.title: 2DGUI.WebAudioNumericKeyboard
list.description:
A custom numeric keyboard interface for precise parameter adjustment in WebAudio applications. Integrates with WebAudioParam for seamless user input and supports interpolated value changes.

Features:

  • Dynamic Input: Buttons for numeric and symbol input, including backspace, negative, and enter.
  • Interpolation: Smooth value transitions based on slider-defined durations.
  • Keyboard and Touch Support: Responds to physical keyboards and touch events.
  • Real-Time Display: Updates the output display and triggers events during input.
  • Min/Max Constraints: Validates inputs against defined limits.
  • Accessibility: Fully accessible with keyboard navigation and ARIA attributes.

Attributes:

  • value - The current numeric value.
  • min & max - Define constraints for input values.
  • interpolationDuration - Time (ms) for interpolating changes.
  • outputElement - Displays the current value.
  • sliderValueElement - Displays slider-controlled interpolation duration.

Events:

  • input - Fired on any input value change.
  • submit - Fired on confirmation of input via the "Enter" button.
  • complete - Fired when interpolation is complete.

list.title: 2DGUI.WebAudioParam
list.description:
Custom HTML element for handling parameter values in WebAudio contexts. Designed for seamless integration with the WebAudioNumericKeyboard and ParameterManager.

Features:

  • Integration: Connects to ParameterManager for real-time updates and management.
  • User Interaction: Supports mouse, keyboard, touch, and scroll wheel inputs.
  • Keyboard Interaction: Triggers WebAudioNumericKeyboard for precise numeric input.
  • Dynamic Value Handling: Supports logarithmic and linear scales.
  • Accessibility: Includes ARIA attributes for usability.
  • Customizable: Attributes like colors, fontsize, src for appearance adjustments.

Attributes:

  • root-param - Links to a parameter in the ParameterManager.
  • is-bidirectional - Enables two-way communication with ParameterManager.
  • value - The current value of the parameter.
  • min & max - Parameter range.
  • colors - Specifies colors for display and background.

list.title: 2DGUI.WebAudioSlider
list.description:
Custom HTML element representing a slider control for WebAudio applications. The slider supports both horizontal and vertical orientations, customizable appearance, and bidirectional integration with the ParameterManager.

Features:

  • Configurable attributes: min, max, step, direction, colors.
  • High-DPI support with dynamic resizing for responsive layouts.
  • Supports logarithmic and linear scaling.
  • ARIA attributes for accessibility, including keyboard interaction.
  • Emits standard DOM events (input, change) for value changes.

list.title: 2DGUI.WebAudioSwitch
list.description:
Custom HTML element representing a switch control for WebAudio applications. The switch supports multiple types (toggle, kick, radio, sequential) and integrates with the ParameterManager for dynamic state management.

Features:

  • Configurable attributes: type, min, max, step, colors, group.
  • Supports group behavior for radio switches and sequential cycling.
  • High-DPI support with dynamic resizing for responsive layouts.
  • Emits standard DOM events (input, change) for state changes.
  • ARIA attributes for accessibility and keyboard interaction.
  • Customizable visuals with hexagon or circle shapes depending on type.

list.title: 2DGUI.exports.AppNotifications
list.description: Creates an instance of AppNotifications. Initializes the notification container in the DOM.

list.title: 2DGUI.exports.ButtonGroup
list.description: Creates an instance of ButtonGroup.

list.title: 2DGUI.setupCollapseMenuAlignment
list.description: Sets up alignment for the information collapse menu. Adjusts the menu's position based on window size and button position. Attaches relevant event listeners for alignment updates.

list.title: 3DGUI
list.description: Manages 3D graphical user interface components, including interactive elements within 3D scenes. It integrates seamlessly with Three.js to provide immersive user interactions.

list.title:
3DGUI 
Provides functions to set up the 3D environment for rendering objects.initScene
list.description: Initializes the Three.js scene, camera, and orbit controls. Sets up the basic 3D environment with a perspective camera and orbit controls for user interaction.

list.title: 3DGUI.addLights
list.description: Adds ambient and directional lights to the Three.js scene. Enhances the visibility and depth of objects within the scene.

list.title: 3DGUI.animate
list.description: Animation loop for the application. Updates controls and renders the scene.

list.title: 3DGUI.exports.loadAndDisplayModel
list.description: Loads and displays a GLB model within a Three.js scene using provided track data.

list.title: 3DGUI.handleWindowResize
list.description: Handles window resize events to adjust the camera aspect ratio and renderer size accordingly. Ensures the 3D scene remains properly scaled and proportioned when the browser window size changes.

list.title: 3DGUI.initRenderer
list.description: Initializes the Three.js WebGL renderer. Configures the renderer with antialiasing and transparency, and sets its size and pixel ratio.

list.title: AppNotifications#showParameterSelectionModal
list.description: Displays a Parameter Selection Modal with a list of available parameters.

list.title: AppNotifications#showToast
list.description: Displays a toast notification.

list.title: AppNotifications#showUniversalModal
list.description: Displays a universal modal using Bootstrap and returns a promise that resolves when the modal is closed.

list.title: AudioEngine
list.description: Encapsulates the core logic for audio processing, synthesis, and playback. This namespace manages the Web Audio API and RNBO, sound engines, and audio parameters to create a dynamic sound environment.

list.title: Constants.CACHE_EXPIRY_MINUTES
list.description: Duration in minutes after which cached data expires.

list.title: Constants.DEFAULT_TRACK_ID
list.description: Default track ID used when none is specified.

list.title: Constants.TRACK_DATA
list.description: Data associated with the current track. Initially set to null.

list.title: Constants.TRACK_ID
list.description: Currently active track ID. Initially set to null.

list.title: Constants.clearTrackData
list.description: Clears cached data for the specified trackId.

list.title: Constants.getTrackData
list.description: Retrieves cached track data for the specified trackId.

list.title: Constants.setTrackData
list.description: Sets and caches track data for the specified trackId.

list.title: CoreModule
list.description: The CoreModule serves as the backbone of the application, organizing and executing foundational logic. It provides a centralized system for managing interactions, parameter transformations, and application state, ensuring seamless operation and integration of various components.

list.title: CoreModule.ParameterManager
list.description: Singleton class responsible for managing application parameters, including their values, ranges, transformations, and subscriber notifications.

list.title: CoreModule.applyColorsFromTrackData
list.description: Applies color configurations to the document based on track data. Updates CSS variables and redraws UI components to reflect new colors.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.DEFAULT_PRIORITY
list.description: Fallback priority value for undefined controller types.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.DEFAULT_TRACK_ID
list.description: Default track ID used across the application.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.DataManager
list.description: Creates an instance of DataManager.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.MIDI_SUPPORTED
list.description: Indicates whether the browser supports the Web MIDI API.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.PRIORITY_MAP
list.description: Defines priority levels for various controller types.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.TRACK_ID
list.description: Currently active track ID. Initially set to null.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.linear
list.description: Linear transformation (identity). Suitable for parameters where linear scaling is appropriate.

list.title: CoreModule.exports.logarithmic
list.description: Logarithmic transformation. Converts a normalized [0,1] value to a dB scale suitable for audio volume. Handles edge cases by clamping input to avoid invalid logarithmic operations.

list.title: CoreModule.initializeApp
list.description: Initializes the application. Fetches track data, sets up the scene, and configures interactions.

list.title: CoreModule.initializeRootParams
list.description: Initializes root parameters for the ParameterManager. Dynamically maps parameters to the manager based on track data.

list.title: CoreModule.setupInteractions
list.description: Sets up interactions for dynamic placeholder updates. Initializes ButtonGroups and registers MIDI controllers if supported.

list.title: CoreModule.updateKnobsFromTrackData
list.description: Dynamically creates and updates knobs based on track data. Configures UI components for sound engine parameters.

list.title: DataManager#cacheExpiryMinutes
list.description: Cache expiry time in minutes, derived from Constants or defaulting to 10 minutes.

list.title: DataManager#fetchAndUpdateConfig
list.description: Fetches track data and updates the placeholder configuration.

list.title: DataManager#fetchTrackData
list.description: Fetches track data from the server or retrieves it from the cache if available.

list.title: DataManager#placeholderConfig
list.description: Configuration object for UI placeholders, initialized as empty.

list.title: DataManager#populatePlaceholders
list.description: Populates the UI placeholders with the configured data.

list.title: InputInterface
list.description: Provides documentation for sensors, MIDI controllers, touch, and other user input mechanisms. This namespace focuses on capturing, processing, and responding to user interactions efficiently and intuitively.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController
list.description: Creates an instance of MIDIController. Implements the Singleton pattern to ensure only one instance exists.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#activateMIDI
list.description: Activates MIDI mode by requesting MIDI access. Shows a toast notification upon successful activation.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#clearMidiMapping
list.description: Clears the MIDI mapping for a specific parameter or widget. Removes visual indicators and updates internal mappings.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#currentLearnParam
list.description: The currently selected parameter for MIDI Learn mode.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#currentLearnWidget
list.description: The currently selected widget for MIDI Learn mode.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#enableMidiLearn
list.description: Enables MIDI Learn mode by creating overlays over automatable elements.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#isMIDIActivated
list.description: Indicates whether MIDI is currently activated.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#isMidiLearnModeActive
list.description: Indicates whether MIDI Learn mode is active.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#midiAccess
list.description: Represents the MIDI access object.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#midiParamMappings
list.description: Maps parameter names to their MIDI channel and Control Change (CC) numbers.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#midiWidgetMappings
list.description: Maps widget IDs to their MIDI channel and Control Change (CC) numbers.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#registerWidget
list.description: Registers a widget for MIDI control.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#setMidiWidgetMapping
list.description: Sets a MIDI mapping for a widget.

list.title: InputInterface.MIDIController#widgetRegistry
list.description: Registers widget instances by their unique IDs.

list.title: MAX_RETRIES
list.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for loading a GLB model.

list.title: ParameterManager#addParameter
list.description: Adds or updates a parameter with the given configuration. If the parameter already exists, it updates its properties; otherwise, it creates a new parameter.

list.title: ParameterManager#getNormalizedValue
list.description: Retrieves the current normalized value of a parameter.

list.title: ParameterManager#getParameter
list.description: Gets the details of a specific parameter by name. Useful for accessing and debugging individual parameters.

list.title: ParameterManager#getRawValue
list.description: Retrieves the current raw value of a parameter.

list.title: ParameterManager#listParameters
list.description: Lists all registered parameters with their current values and settings. Useful for debugging and inspecting parameter states.

list.title: ParameterManager#parameters
list.description: Stores parameters mapped by their names.

list.title: ParameterManager#setControllerValue
list.description: Sets the value from a controller by applying the inputTransform. Facilitates controller-driven updates with priority handling.

list.title: ParameterManager#setNormalizedValue
list.description: Updates the normalized value of a parameter and notifies subscribers. Converts normalized to raw before updating. Handles priority and simultaneous updates.

list.title: ParameterManager#setRawValue
list.description: Updates the raw value of a parameter and notifies subscribers. Handles bidirectional updates if enabled and ensures priority rules.

list.title: ParameterManager#setToMiddle
list.description: Sets the parameter to the middle (normalized value of 0.5) directly, without any priority or simultaneous logic.

list.title: ParameterManager#subscribe
list.description: Subscribes a controller to a parameter with a specified priority. Controllers with higher priority (lower number) receive updates first.

list.title: ParameterManager#unsubscribe
list.description: Unsubscribes a controller from a parameter. Removes the controller from the parameter's subscriber list.

list.title: ParameterManager.getInstance
list.description: Provides access to the Singleton instance of ParameterManager.

list.title: _setValue
list.description: Sets the internal value without triggering events.

list.title: activateRadio
list.description: Activates the radio switch, ensuring only this switch is active in its group.

list.title: addEventListeners
list.description: Adds necessary event listeners to the slider element.

list.title: addLights~ambientLight
list.description: Ambient light provides a base level of light uniformly across the scene.

list.title: addLights~directionalLight
list.description: Directional light simulates sunlight, casting shadows and providing directional illumination.

list.title: alignCollapseMenu
list.description: Aligns the collapse menu relative to the information button.

list.title: cycleState
list.description: Cycles through states (for sequential type). Accepts an optional delta to increment/decrement.

list.title: drawKnob
list.description: Draws the knob on the canvas based on the provided ratio.

list.title: drawModeIndicator
list.description: Draws additional indicators based on the current type and state.

list.title: drawSlider
list.description: Draws the slider on the canvas based on the provided ratio.

list.title: drawSwitch
list.description: Draws the switch on the canvas based on its type and state.

list.title: external:WebAudioControls
list.description:
WebAudio-Controls is a library that provides customizable audio control elements such as knobs, sliders, switches, keyboards, and parameters. It integrates and enhances the following external libraries:

  • webaudio-knob by Eiji Kitamura Website
  • webaudio-slider by Ryoya Kawai Google+ Post
  • webaudio-switch by Keisuke Ai Hatena Blog

Integrated and enhanced by g200kg (Tatsuya Shinyagaito) Website

Modifications by Bruna Guarnieri:

  • Knobs (webaudio-knob): Fully styled rotary controls with customizable colors, sizes, and behavior.
  • Sliders (webaudio-slider): Linear sliders with horizontal and vertical orientation options.
  • Switches (webaudio-switch): Includes toggle, kick, radio, and sequential types with group handling for radio switches.
  • Keyboard (webaudio-keyboard): Simulates a MIDI keyboard with configurable keys, colors, and MIDI integration.
  • Parameters (webaudio-param): Provides numeric input fields with customizable visual styles and MIDI compatibility.
  • Rendering: Draws controls (like sliders and switches) using the <canvas> API for precise visual control.

License: Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0. See the LICENSE file for details.

Date of Modification: November 2024

Notice: This file includes modifications by Bruna Guarnieri and complies with the requirements of the Apache License 2.0. The original work and its attributions have been retained as required.

list.title: getPriority
list.description: Retrieves the priority for a given controller type. Defaults to DEFAULT_PRIORITY if the type is not defined in PRIORITY_MAP.

list.title: handleParamChange
list.description: Handles changes from the linked parameter.

list.title: hidetip
list.description: Hides the tooltip after a specified delay.

list.title: initializeAttributes
list.description: Initializes attributes with proper parsing and defaults.

list.title: isActive
list.description: Determines if the switch is active based on the type and state.

list.title: keydown
list.description: Handles keydown events for accessibility.

list.title: onParameterChanged
list.description: Handles parameter updates from ParameterManager.

list.title: onParameterChanged
list.description: Handles parameter updates from ParameterManager.

list.title: onParameterChanged
list.description: Handles parameter updates from ParameterManager.

list.title: pointerdown
list.description: Handles pointer down events to initiate dragging.

list.title: pointermove
list.description: Handles pointer move events to update the slider value.

list.title: pointerup
list.description: Handles pointer up events to end dragging.

list.title: processColors
list.description: Processes color attributes, allowing external customization.

list.title: redraw
list.description: Redraws the slider based on the current value and settings.

list.title: removeEventListeners
list.description: Removes event listeners from the slider element.

list.title: setValue
list.description: Sets the value and optionally notifies the ParameterManager and dispatches events.

list.title: setValue
list.description: Sets the value and optionally fires events.

list.title: setValue
list.description: Sets the value and optionally notifies the ParameterManager and dispatches events.

list.title: setupCanvas
list.description: Sets up the canvas dimensions and scaling.

list.title: setupLabel
list.description: Sets up the label. Customize this method based on your labeling needs.

list.title: setupResizeObserver
list.description: Sets up ResizeObserver to handle responsiveness.

list.title: showtip
list.description: Shows the tooltip after a specified delay.

list.title: src/AppNotifications.js
list.description: Manages application notifications, including toast messages and modals.

list.title: src/ButtonGroup.js
list.description: Manages button groups within the Interplanetary Players application, handling interactions, SVG loading, and event bindings.

list.title: src/Constants.js
list.description: Defines and manages application-wide constants and utility functions. Handles caching mechanisms and prioritization for various controller types.

list.title: src/DataManager.js
list.description: Manages data fetching, caching, and placeholder configuration for track information.

list.title: src/Interaction.js
list.description: Sets up interactions for dynamic placeholder updates, handles MIDI registrations, and applies UI color configurations based on track data.

list.title: src/Loaders.js
list.description: Handles the loading and displaying of 3D models using Three.js and GLTFLoader with retry logic.

list.title: src/MIDIController.js
list.description: Handles all MIDI controller-related logic, including MIDI interactions, mappings, and MIDI Learn functionality.

list.title: src/Main.js
list.description: Entry point for initializing the Interplanetary Players application. Handles scene setup, parameter management, interactions, and rendering.

list.title: src/ParameterManager.js
list.description: Manages application parameters, including adding, updating, subscribing, and emitting parameter changes.

list.title: src/Scene.js
list.description: Scene.js

list.title: src/Transformations.js
list.description: Provides transformation functions for non-linear parameter mappings. Each transformation includes an inputTransform and an outputTransform.

list.title: toggleState
list.description: Toggles the switch state (for toggle type).

list.title: triggerKick
list.description: Triggers a kick (momentary press).

list.title: updateLinkedParam
list.description: Updates the linked parameter when the slider value changes.

list.title: updateTooltip
list.description: Updates the tooltip with the current value.

list.title: updateValueFromPointer
list.description: Updates the slider value based on absolute pointer position.

list.title: updateValueFromPointerRel
list.description: Updates the slider value based on relative pointer movement.

list.title: validateValue
list.description: Validates the user-provided value against min and max constraints. If the value exceeds the limits, it will be clamped.

list.title: wheel
list.description: Handles wheel events for adjusting the slider value.
